data.title: Chin Beckmann - Co-Founder & CEO at DSP Concepts
data.meta_description: Chin Beckmann is the Co-Founder and CEO of DSP Concepts. Prior to DSP Concepts, Inc., they were with California Pops Orchestra and Proteon, Inc.
data.text:
Chin Beckmann is the Co-Founder and CEO of DSP Concepts. Prior to DSP Concepts, Inc., they were with California Pops Orchestra and Proteon, Inc. As an Information Systems Engineer, they were responsible for making a sales tool for the sales force to facilitate communication and gather information from customers through our sales team. The system integrated into the customer service database and bug reporting/bug fixes database. This experience led him to their current role as CEO of DSP Concepts.

Chin Beckmann has a BS in Computer Engineering and Piano from Boston University and an MBA in Finance and Entrepreneurship from Northeastern University's High Tech MBA program.

Some direct reports include Paul Beckmann - Founder & CTO, Eric Skup - VP, Customer Acquisition & Success, and Tuan Nguyen - VP, Engineering.
